problem_text_cn: 如图,一把遮阳伞撑开时母线的长是2米,底面半径为1米,则做这把遮阳伞需用布料的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the generatrix when a parasol is opened is N_0, and the radius of the bottom surface is N_1, then the area of ​​fabric required to make this parasol is ()
raw_answer: 解:根据圆锥与它的侧面展开图的关系可得:做这把遮阳伞需用布料的面积是\frac{1}{2}lr=π×1×2=2π(m^{2}),故选:B．
